title: Gross value added
summary: By category of output (reference year 2010) for production and service industries

breadcrumb.title: Home
breadcrumb.summary: The UK's largest independent producer of official statistics and the recognised national statistical institute of the UK.

breadcrumb.title: Economy
breadcrumb.summary: An economy or economic system consists of the production, distribution, consumption and trade of limited goods and services by different agents in a given geographical location. The economic agents can be individuals, businesses, organisations, or governments.

breadcrumb.title: Economic output and productivity
breadcrumb.summary: Economic output is the total value of goods and/or services produced in a process. Statistics on economic output include indices on manufacturing, production and services. Productivity is a measure of efficiency. It can be expressed as a ratio of output to input over a given period of time, for example output per person per hour.
